backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor defining data types (UserProfile, Payment, MonetaryEvent, TravelEntry, Traveller, CoTravellerIncome, AppData) and implementing CRUD operations for user profiles and app data with role-based access control via MixinAuthorization.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting two implemented features: auto-toll weekday checking/adding on app launch (REQ-1) and multi-category expense form for simultaneous Toll/CNG BRD/CNG AHM entries (REQ-2).
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend source files including components, hooks, and utilities for the carpool ledger application with authentication, ledger management, and export functionality.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with root div and module script reference to main.tsx for the daily car-pooling payment tracker application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root component managing authentication flow, profile setup modal, auto-toll logic (adds toll once per weekday on launch if not already added for that date), and renders LedgerPage with theme provider and toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/AppHeader.tsx: Sticky header with app branding, sync status indicator, and user dropdown menu with logout functionality that clears React Query cache, local storage, and triggers parent callback.
frontend/src/components/AuthGate.tsx: Authentication gate component displaying a login screen with Internet Identity integration for unauthenticated users and rendering children for authenticated users.
frontend/src/components/EmptyState.tsx: Reusable empty state component displaying an icon/illustration, title, description, and optional action button for empty data scenarios.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal dialog for first-time user profile setup requiring name input, with prevented outside clicks/escape key and profile save mutation integration.
frontend/src/components/ResponsiveTableS: Wrapper component providing horizontal scrolling for tables on mobile devices using ScrollArea with horizontal scrollbar.
frontend/src/components/SyncStatusIndica: Displays sync status (syncing, synced, failed) with icons and time-ago text. Shows cloud icons with animation for syncing state and error messages for failures.
frontend/src/features/ledger/BackupResto: Provides UI for exporting ledger data to JSON file and importing/restoring from backup files. Includes confirmation dialog for restoring when draft changes exist and uses non-destructive merge.
frontend/src/features/ledger/CarExpenses: Manages car expense tracking with predefined categories (CNG, Petrol, Toll, etc.), auto-toll settings, and multi-category expense forms. Calculates and displays category totals for the current date range.
frontend/src/features/ledger/CashPayment: Dialog form component for recording cash payments to travellers. Validates amount input and allows adding optional notes and date selection.
frontend/src/features/ledger/ClearDataPa: Password-protected panel for clearing ledger data with granular options (all data, daily trips, cash payments, other pending, car expenses). Requires password '7Days#Week' and shows confirmation dialogs.
frontend/src/features/ledger/CoTraveller: Dialog form for adding or editing other co-traveller income entries. Supports amount, date picker, and optional notes with validation and submission handling.
frontend/src/features/ledger/DailyPartic: Displays a grid for tracking daily morning and evening trip participation for travellers, with bulk toggle controls, weekend inclusion settings, and save functionality. Includes responsive table layout with per-date and per-traveller checkboxes, showing trip counts and costs.
frontend/src/features/ledger/DateRangePi: Provides a date range picker component with two calendar popovers for selecting start and end dates. Supports both controlled mode via props and uncontrolled mode using LedgerStateContext.
frontend/src/features/ledger/DeleteCarEx: Confirmation dialog for deleting a car expense entry, displaying the category and amount. Shows a destructive action button and displays a success toast on confirmation.
frontend/src/features/ledger/DeleteCashP: Confirmation dialog for deleting a cash payment entry, displaying the traveller name and amount. Shows a destructive action button and displays a success toast on confirmation.
frontend/src/features/ledger/DeleteTripH: Confirmation dialog for deleting a trip history entry for either a traveller or co-traveller. Displays entry details (name, date, type) and warns that the action cannot be undone.
frontend/src/features/ledger/EditCarExpe: Dialog form for editing an existing car expense with fields for category, amount, date, and optional note. Includes validation for required fields and displays success toast on update.
frontend/src/features/ledger/EditCashPay: Dialog form for editing an existing cash payment with fields for amount, date, and optional note. Includes validation for positive amounts and displays success toast on update.
frontend/src/features/ledger/EditTripHis: Dialog form for editing a traveller's trip participation (morning/evening checkboxes) for a specific date. Updates trip data via LedgerStateContext and shows success/error toasts.
frontend/src/features/ledger/ExpenseHist: Wrapper dialog component that displays the ExpenseHistoryView in a modal with scrollable content. Provides title and description for viewing and managing expense records.
Displays a filterable and searchable table of car expenses with edit and delete actions, including category filtering and date range filtering. Shows an empty state when no expenses exist.
frontend/src/features/ledger/ExportButto: Simple button component that opens the ExportReportDialog when clicked, displaying a download icon and 'Export' label.
frontend/src/features/ledger/ExportRepor: Dialog for exporting ledger reports in CSV or PDF format with multiple report types (standard, monthly, profit/loss, income, expense), section filters, traveller selection, and independent date range controls.
Main ledger page component with tabbed navigation (travellers, daily grid, summary, expenses, etc.), per-tab date range management, unsaved changes detection, and mobile sidebar support. Integrates data sync and manages multiple dialog states.
frontend/src/features/ledger/LedgerState: React context provider that wraps useLedgerLocalState hook and exposes all ledger state and actions (travellers, daily data, payments, expenses, etc.) to child components.
frontend/src/features/ledger/MobileLedge: Mobile sheet sidebar navigation component displaying menu items for all ledger tabs and action buttons for payment history, expense history, and export.
frontend/src/features/ledger/MonthYearRa: Dropdown selectors for choosing month and year ranges, supporting full month, full year, and custom range classifications with automatic range updates.
frontend/src/features/ledger/MultiCatego: Dialog form component for adding three predefined car expenses (Toll, CNG BRD, CNG AHM) simultaneously with individual amounts and dates.
frontend/src/features/ledger/OtherPendin: Dialog form component for adding additional pending amounts to a traveller's account with optional notes and date selection.
frontend/src/features/ledger/OverallSumm: Card component displaying overall financial summary including total income, expenses, profit/loss, and monthly breakdowns calculated from daily trip data and car expenses.
frontend/src/features/ledger/PaymentHist: Dialog wrapper component that displays the PaymentHistoryView for viewing all cash payments within the selected date range.
Table view component for displaying, filtering, editing, and deleting cash payment records with traveller filtering and date range support.
frontend/src/features/ledger/PaymentSumm: Card component showing per-traveller payment summaries including total charges, payments received, other pending amounts, and outstanding balances with overall totals.
frontend/src/features/ledger/RatePerTrip: Input control component for setting and displaying the rate per trip with currency formatting and validation.
frontend/src/features/ledger/SummaryPane: Displays per-traveller summary cards showing trip counts (weekday/weekend), total charges, payments, other pending amounts, and balance status with forms to add cash payments and other pending amounts.
frontend/src/features/ledger/TravellerMa: Manages the list of travellers with add, rename, and delete functionality; prevents deletion of travellers with outstanding balances and displays empty state when no travellers exist.
frontend/src/features/ledger/TripHistory: Shows a chronological table of all trip entries (traveller trips and co-traveller income) within the date range with edit/delete actions and total trip count and amount calculations.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor using Internet Identity, initializing access control and invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAppDataSync.ts: Manages bidirectional sync between local ledger state and remote backend with polling, debounced saves, conflict-free merging, and sync status tracking for authenticated users.
frontend/src/hooks/useAutoTollSettings.t: Manages auto-toll settings (enabled flag, amount, last auto-toll date) with localStorage persistence and provides getter/setter functions.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication, managing login/logout flow, identity persistence, and authentication status with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/hooks/useLedgerLocalState.t: Custom React hook managing carpool ledger state with localStorage persistence, including travellers, daily trip data, payments, expenses, and date ranges. Provides functions to add/remove travellers, toggle trips, manage payments/expenses, and handle backup/restore operations.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching and saving user profile data from the backend actor. Provides `useGetCallerUserProfile` for retrieving the current user's profile and `useSaveCallerUserProfile` mutation for updating it.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom color palette using warm neutral and amber tones for light/dark themes. Includes base styling for tables with zebra striping and improved mobile legibility.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query client, Internet Identity provider, and renders the root App component with necessary context providers.
Utility functions for generating financial reports including monthly breakdowns, profit/loss statements, and income/expense statements from ledger data. Calculates trip income, co-traveller income, and categorized expenses across date ranges.
frontend/src/utils/backupRestore.ts: Handles backup and restore operations for ledger state, including JSON export/import to files and validation. Provides merging logic to combine local and remote states with union-based conflict resolution.
frontend/src/utils/dateRange.ts: Date utility functions for generating and classifying date ranges (month, year, week, custom). Provides helpers for formatting dates, filtering weekdays, and determining range types for display purposes.
frontend/src/utils/exportExcel.ts: Exports ledger data to CSV format with two sheets: a daily grid showing AM/PM trips per traveller, and a summary showing total trips, charges, payments, and balances. Handles CSV formatting and browser download.
frontend/src/utils/exportPdf.ts: Generates PDF reports for carpool ledger data with multiple report types (standard, monthly, profit/loss, income, expense) using HTML templates and styling for A4 format output.
frontend/src/utils/exportReport.ts: Exports carpool ledger data to CSV format with configurable filters for travellers, daily grids, summaries, payments, and expenses; routes PDF exports to the PDF generator utility.
frontend/src/utils/ledgerBalances.ts: Calculates traveller balances by computing total trips, charges, payments, and other pending amounts within a date range, respecting weekend inclusion settings and saved trip data.
frontend/src/utils/money.ts: Provides currency formatting and parsing utilities for Indian Rupees (INR) with locale-aware formatting.
frontend/src/utils/tripCalculations.ts: Calculates total and monthly income from daily trip data and co-traveller incomes within date ranges, respecting weekend inclusion settings and saved trip data.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for extracting, persisting, and managing URL parameters from both regular query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage integration for parameter persistence.
frontend/src/utils/weekendInclusion.ts: Determines weekend day status and whether dates should be included in calculations or editing based on weekend checkboxes and existing saved trip data.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom theme extensions including OKLCH color system, Inter/JetBrains Mono fonts, accordion animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state tracking for Carpool Ledger expense app with existing features for auto-toll weekday addition and multi-category batch expense entry (Toll, CNG BRD, CNG AHM).
